info.title: SEC Filings
info.description: A collection of methods that returns various financial data for a requested company including SEC Filings, balance sheets, financial ratios , company look-up utilities and more.
info.x-long-description: A collection of methods that returns various financial data for a requested company including SEC Filings, balance sheets, financial ratios , company look-up utilities and more.

parameters.name: filingOrder
parameters.description: Retrieve an older financial statement by specifying number of filings to go back. For example, to retrieve the second to most recent filing, specify a filingOrder value of 1. By default, the most recent filing is returned (filingOrder = 0)

get.description: Returns a company's most recent statement of operations showing how they balance costs with revenue

parameters.name: filingorder
parameters.description: Retrieve an older financial statement by specifying number of filings to go back. For example, to retrieve the 10-K filed last year, specify a filingOrder value of 1. By default, the most recent filing is returned (filingOrder = 0)

get.description: Returns a company's most recent income statement detailing what they earn for providing their goods and services OR a statement of loss explaining where lost income occurred

parameters.name: filingOrder
parameters.description: Retrieve an older financial statement by specifying number of filings to go back. For example, to retrieve the second to most recent filing, specify a filingOrder value of 1. By default, the most recent filing is returned (filingOrder = 0)

get.description: Returns a company's most recent cash flow statement showing the amount of cash used and generated

parameters.name: filingorder
parameters.description: Retrieve an older financial statement by specifying number of filings to go back. For example, to retrieve the second to most recent filing, specify a filingOrder value of 1. By default, the most recent filing is returned (filingOrder = 0)

get.description: Returns a company's most recent balance sheet summarizing their liabilities, assets and shareholders' equity
